cobblemon.species.ashrowlet.name: Ash-Rowlet
cobblemon.species.ashrowlet.desc1: This wary Pokémon uses photosynthesis to store up energy during the day, while becoming active at night.
cobblemon.species.ashrowlet.desc2: Silently it glides, drawing near its targets. Before they even notice it, it begins to pelt them with vicious kicks.
cobblemon.species.turpinch.name: Turpinch
cobblemon.species.turpinch.desc1: It lives in arid deserts. It makes a sloping pit trap in sand where it patiently awaits prey
cobblemon.species.turpinch.desc2: Its big jaws crunch through boulders. Because its head is so big, it has a hard time getting back upright if it tips over onto its back
cobblemon.species.swagtle.name: Ｓｑｕｉｒｔｌｅ
cobblemon.species.swagtle.desc1: A brutal POKéMON with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.
cobblemon.species.swagtle.desc2: Once it takes aim at its enemy, it blasts out water with even more force than a fire hose.
cobblemon.species.mimikyup.name: Jessie-Mimikyu
cobblemon.species.mimikyup.desc1: A brutal POKéMON with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.
cobblemon.species.mimikyup.desc2: Once it takes aim at its enemy, it blasts out water with even more force than a fire hose.
cobblemon.species.ashpikachu.name: Ash-Pikachu
cobblemon.species.ashpikachu.desc1: This form of Pikachu is somewhat rare. It wears the hat of its Trainer, who is also its partner.
cobblemon.species.ashpikachu.desc2: This Pikachu is wearing its Trainer’s cap. Since the cap’s not the right size, the fit is a bit loose.
cobblemon.species.greninjaz.name: Greninja
cobblemon.species.greninjaz.desc1: This form of greninja is somewhat rare. It wears the hat of its fallen trainer!.
cobblemon.species.greninjaz.desc2: This form of greninja is somewhat rare. It wears the hat of its fallen trainer!.
cobblemon.species.sylveonz.name: Sylveon
cobblemon.species.sylveonz.desc1: Sylveon loves to dance, as an Eevee, she had a timid personality and was easily scared by new people.
cobblemon.species.sylveonz.desc2: Sylveon has a passion for dancing, liking to perform her moves on a stage-like rock prior to her capture.
